class.name: DefaultTransformer

javadoc.text: A Default NumberTransformer for java.lang.Numbers and Numeric Strings. This * provides some simple conversion capabilities to turn any java.lang.Number * into a primitive double or to turn a String representation of a Number into * a double.

javadoc.param: o the object that gets transformed.
javadoc.return: a double primitive representation of the Object o.
javadoc.throws: MathIllegalArgumentException if Object o * cannot successfully be transformed
